nodes.text: A model of slugthrower rifle was present in multiple homesteads on backwater worlds in the Outer Rim Territories such as Tatooine and Saleucami.

This model of slugthrower rifle utilized a more old-fashioned design that was visually similar to other slugthrowers such as the Tusken cycler rifle, with an elongated barrel that allowed for precise shots at long range. Like similar rifles, this model was reloaded manually.

A rifle of this model was owned by Suu Lawquane and kept on the planet Saleucami during the Clone Wars and shortly afterward. She used the rifle on multiple occasions, such as a precautionary measure when a group of Galactic Republic clone troopers that included an injured Clone Captain Rex sought out shelter at her husband's Farm. Her husband Cut Lawquane also used the slugthrower days afterward to fight off droids in his home with the help of Captain Rex. She again used the rifle years later to fend off a nexu that was attacking a young girl named Omega soon after the rise of the Galactic Empire.

Luke Skywalker also owned a rifle of this model during his youth on Tatooine. He took the rifle with him when he went to search for runaway droid R2-D2 in his X-34 landspeeder. The rifle was destroyed when Luke was subsequently ambushed in the Jundland Wastes by the Tusken Raider A'Koba prior to Skywalker's rescue by Obi-Wan Kenobi.
